message: I'm sorry, but, I'm more concerned about AMERICA worrying & taking care of AMERICA. It's about damn time. Our homeless, despondent, runaways, sick & forgotten veterans need our attention 1st. We get involved with every other freaking Middle Eastern country anymore, bail them out, & aid them, putting our country into massive debt, then we have to deal with the """"fall out."""" We need to take care of our own, now. It's way past time. My opinion, & my right, & freedom to express it. That's 1 of the great things about the United States of America.
